title: Van der Poel vs the World? Ranking the Gold Medal Favorites for the Men’s Olympic Road Race
content:
Can Van Aert usurp Van der Poel? Will Alaphilippe deliver panache to Paris? We rate the five-star favorites and wildcard outsiders for Saturday's road race.

Read the full article at Van der Poel vs the World? Ranking the Gold Medal Favorites for the Men’s Olympic Road Race on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
